title: Mark Zuckerberg rebranded Facebook for the metaverse. Four years and $70 billion in losses later, he’s moving on
description: Zuckerberg once framed Metaverse as the “successor to the mobile internet."
content: In 2021, Mark Zuckerberg recast Facebook as Meta and declared the metaverse a digital realm where people would work, socialize, and spend much of their lives the companys next great frontier. He fram… [+3453 chars]
